title: Integrated Flipped Learning and Mobile Learning Curriculum for Large-Scale Applied Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social studies education theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Goal of Strengthening Competencies for Current Elementary Teachers to Effectively Design and Operate Integrated Social Studies Classes

learning_goals: Learners can acquire foundational concepts by completing over 80% of pre-learning materials in a flipped learning structure.
Learners can demonstrate proactive learning attitudes by participating in interactive activities via mobile platforms at least twice weekly.
Learners can enhance integrated instructional design competencies to at least 70% proficiency through formative assessments.
Learners can apply learned content with 90% accuracy using peer feedback and real-time Q&A systems.

resources: Automated Grading System with Feedback Database

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
